meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into fourteen fourteenths for each guest.
meanings.sent2: She received two fourteenths of the total prize money.
meanings.sent3: The fourteenths of the pizza were so tiny, they looked like crumbs.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player represented a different fourteenths of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The fourteenths of the rainbow shone brightly in the sky.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to fourteen in a series.
meanings.sent1: She was born on the fourteenth, the fourteenths day of the month.
meanings.sent2: He was ranked fourteenths in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The fourteenths person in line won a special prize.
meanings.sent4: The fourteenths chapter of the book revealed a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The fourteenths step of the staircase creaked loudly.
